Title: Billy & Mandy's Big Boogey Adventure
Actors: Grey Griffin, Greg Eagles, Richard Steven Horvitz
Plot: When the Boogey Man causes Grim to lose his powers, rank, and title in the Underworld Court for misusing his powers, he plots to seek out Horror's Hand and take over the world. It's up to Billy, Mandy, Irwin, and Grim to get to Ho...
